name: Lava cave (Goplite)
description:
• Escape from lava by climbing higher and higher, hiding behind lavaproof hatches.
  • Take artifacts with you, they give you score and without them your adventure is useless.
  • Use impulse gun in smart ways to reach even higher or give yourself boost.
  • Every few hatches artifacts will multiply,  more artifacts - higher score, more resilent the hatches!
